This is a multi-part message in MIME format. ------_=_NextPart_001_01C346EA.D0FD5BE4 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable =20 Hi everybody, =20 Does somebody know how to produce a rendering highlighting annual = sunhours or luxhours, if possible combined with a file with cloudiness = factors of a Test Reference Year for a certain location ??? =20 I don't even know where to start ! =20 Jochen=20 ________________________________________________________________________ This=20e-mail=20has=20been=20scanned=20for=20all=20viruses=20by=20Star=20I= nternet.=20The service=20is=20powered=20by=20MessageLabs.=20For=20more=20information=20on= =20a=20proactive anti-virus=20service=20working=20around=20the=20clock,=20around=20the=20gl= obe,=20visit: http://www.star.net.uk ________________________________________________________________________ ------_=_NextPart_001_01C346EA.D0FD5BE4 Content-Type: text/html; charset="iso-8859-1" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
 
Hi=20 everybody,
 
Does = somebody know=20 how to produce a rendering highlighting annual sunhours or luxhours, if=20 possible combined with a file with cloudiness factors of = a Test=20 Reference Year for a certain location ???
 
I = don't even know=20 where to start !
 
Jochen =
